GSD.description:
ARM: mmp: Fix failure to remove sram device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 4ab0293c961b75f914d05c9ed67fbb137315955a. For more details please see the references link.
